# Aggressive Thundercloud, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]], [[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Magus Spells|Magus 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Witch Spells|Witch 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a piece of a tree struck by lightning)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** 5-ft.-diameter sphere

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Reflex negates and Fortitude negates (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 172

This spell functions as *[[Aggressive Thundercloud (Spell)|aggressive thundercloud]]*, except it deals 6d6 points of electricity damage to any creature it strikes. The first creature damaged by the cloud is also [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round (Fortitude negates); this is a sonic effect.
